Recommendation.title: Diagnose and Resolve Operating System Not Found Issue

steps.action: Check Hard Drive Detection in BIOS
steps.description: Ensure the BIOS recognizes the hard drive. If undetected, the OS cannot boot.
Confirm the correct boot order. The OS drive should be first to prevent boot failure.
Create a bootable USB to diagnose or repair the OS if the hard drive is detected but corrupted.
Check for hardware issues using diagnostic tools, ensuring the drive is functional.
